text: University of Madrid may refer to: * Complutense University of Madrid, a public research university founded in 1293, historically referred to as the Universidad de Madrid * Autonomous University of Madrid, a public university established in 1968 also known as UAM * Technical University of Madrid, founded in 1971 from the merger of several schools of engineering and architecture, originated mainly in the 18th century * Carlos III University of Madrid, a public university founded in 1989 * European University of Madrid, a private university founded in 1995 and owned by Laureate Education, Inc.
title: University of Madrid
